medical_history.chief_complaint: Chronic but worsening lower back pain.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient's lower back pain was chronic and had been worsening over time. Additional hospitalization occurred 2 days later due to deterioration, presenting with elevated creatinine levels.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Intravenous drug use; previous elevated creatinine at 119 mmol/L 2 months prior.
